languages.text: {n}Глейто щерит металлические клыки, и Соломон растягивает губы в опасной, полной вызова ухмылке:{/n} "Пусть боятся те, кто прячется от нас на краю вселенной — мы принесем им Лекс Империалис, хотят они этого или нет. Ну что, {name} покажем им всем?"

{n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто щерит металлические клыки, и Соломон растягивает губы в опасной, полной вызова ухмылке:{/n} "Пусть боятся те, кто прячется от нас на краю вселенной — мы принесем им Лекс Империалис, хотят они этого или нет. Ну что, {name} покажем им всем?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the universe be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

{n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the universe be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

{n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the universe be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

{n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

{n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

languages.text: {n}グライトが金属の牙をむき出しにし、ソロモーン口元には、命懸けの勝負を楽しむかのような危険な笑みが広がった。{/n}「銀河の果てに身を潜める者どもよ、震えて待つがいい―望むと望まざるとにかかわらず、私たちはレックス・インペリアを彼らにもたらします。それでは{name}、見せてやるとしましょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトが金属の牙をむき出しにし、ソロモーン口元には、命懸けの勝負を楽しむかのような危険な笑みが広がった。{/n}「銀河の果てに身を潜める者どもよ、震えて待つがいい―望むと望まざるとにかかわらず、私たちはレックス・インペリアを彼らにもたらします。それでは{name}、見せてやるとしましょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Glaito entblößt seine Metallzähne, und Solomornes Mund öffnet sich zu einem breiten, gefährlichen Grinsen: Tod oder Ruhm.{/n} "Die Angst überlassen wir denen, die sich am Rand der Galaxie vor uns verstecken – wir werden das Lex Imperia zu ihnen tragen, ob sie es wollen oder nicht. Also, {name}, wollen wir's ihnen allen zeigen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito entblößt seine Metallzähne, und Solomornes Mund öffnet sich zu einem breiten, gefährlichen Grinsen: Tod oder Ruhm.{/n} "Die Angst überlassen wir denen, die sich am Rand der Galaxie vor uns verstecken – wir werden das Lex Imperia zu ihnen tragen, ob sie es wollen oder nicht. Also, {name}, wollen wir's ihnen allen zeigen?"

languages.text: {n}Glaito retrousse ses babines, laissant apparaître ses crocs métalliques tandis que la bouche de Solomorne s'étire en un sourire tout aussi carnassier.{/n} « Laissons la peur à ceux qui se terrent dans les tréfonds de la galaxie afin d'échapper à la justice. La Lex Imperialis saura les retrouver, qu'ils le veuillent ou non. Qu'en dites-vous, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito retrousse ses babines, laissant apparaître ses crocs métalliques tandis que la bouche de Solomorne s'étire en un sourire tout aussi carnassier.{/n} « Laissons la peur à ceux qui se terrent dans les tréfonds de la galaxie afin d'échapper à la justice. La Lex Imperialis saura les retrouver, qu'ils le veuillent ou non. Qu'en dites-vous, {name} ? »

languages.text: {n}Glaito enseña sus colmillos metálicos, y la boca de Solomorne se ensancha hasta esbozar una sonrisa de temeridad suicida.{/n} «Los que han de asustarse son quienes se ocultan de nosotros en los confines de la galaxia; les impondremos la Lex Imperialis tanto si quieren como si no. ¿Qué me dice, {name}? ¿Les demostramos cómo nos las gastamos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito enseña sus colmillos metálicos, y la boca de Solomorne se ensancha hasta esbozar una sonrisa de temeridad suicida.{/n} «Los que han de asustarse son quienes se ocultan de nosotros en los confines de la galaxia; les impondremos la Lex Imperialis tanto si quieren como si no. ¿Qué me dice, {name}? ¿Les demostramos cómo nos las gastamos?».

languages.text: {n}格雷托露出了金属尖牙，而索罗蒙咧开了嘴，露出了充满危险意味的微笑——要么战死沙场，要么荣耀加身。{/n}“让那些躲在银河系边缘的人瑟瑟发抖吧。无论他们想不想，我们都会将帝国的律法带到他们面前。来吧，{name}，要不要让他们看看我们的厉害？”
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托露出了金属尖牙，而索罗蒙咧开了嘴，露出了充满危险意味的微笑——要么战死沙场，要么荣耀加身。{/n}“让那些躲在银河系边缘的人瑟瑟发抖吧。无论他们想不想，我们都会将帝国的律法带到他们面前。来吧，{name}，要不要让他们看看我们的厉害？”

languages.text: {n}Glaito'nun metal dişlerini göstermesi üzerine Solomorne tehlikeli bir şekilde sırıtıyor. Gülümsemesi, ya ölüm ya şeref fikrini pekiştiriyor.{/n} "Galaksinin ucunda gözümüzden saklananlar bizden korksun. İsteseler de istemeseler de Lex İmperialis'in lütfuna erişecekler. Hiç kimse bu nimetten mahrum kalmasın, değil mi {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito bares his metal fangs, and Solomorne's mouth broadens into a dangerous, death-or-glory grin.{/n} "Let those who hide from us at the edge of the galaxy be afraid — we will bring the Lex Imperialis to them whether they want it or not. So, {name} shall we show them all?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito metal dişlerini gösteriyor ve Solomorne tehlikeli bir şekilde sırıtıyor. Gülümsemesi ya ölüm ya şeref fikrini pekiştiriyor.{/n} "Galaksinin ucunda gözümüzden saklananlar bizden korksun. İsteseler de istemeseler de Lex Imperialis'in lütfuna onlar da erişecekler. O zaman {name}, hiç kimse bu nimetten mahrum kalmasın, değil mi?"
